MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G74 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network outside 131 Glen More and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:41am on Tuesday, 13 April 2021
